ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Mossy Rat Pelts
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes they do. I have a 39 level druid and for fun I walk over to them , round them up, run to the other location gather them up and then once I have them all in
ygData.messageBody:
Yes they do.
I have a 39 level druid and for fun I walk over to
them , round them up, run to the other location gather
them up and then once I have them all in the area, I
cast earthquake, watch them all get pummeled and then
I shout rats to loot with the loc to all NEWBS.

It takes a while to get them but yes they do drop
them.
A few guildees have made the full set with not much
trouble. usually within a week .

Hope this helps

What server you on?
Maybe I can nuke a few for ya......lol



--- Steven Hulse <steveh@...> wrote:
> Hi gang,
>
> I just started a Halfling Druid named Pistashio and
> I'm somewhat working on the newbie armor quest. I'm
> having trouble with part of it that requires Mossy
> Rat Pelts. I have obtained several Ruined and
> undamaged rat pelts but no plain ol' mossy. All the
> research I have done seems to suggest the diseased
> rats drop these so I have been hunting them for
> about a week now and no pelts. Does anyone know if
> they do drop them, if they are rare, no-drop and
> such? Any info would be greatly appriciated. :-)
>
> Thanks!
> --
>
